name: VuePlus
tag_list: online-video, e-commerce, itunes, amazon, magento, youtube, lead-generation
overview:
VuePlus helps you to connect more powerfully with your customers, fans, and video viewers.

VuePlus helps to connect the online video audience with the actions that they want to take after watching a video. Whether it’s to find out more information, declare their Like of a Facebook page, download a song, purchase a product - VuePlus connects fans.

It’s a frictionless process where users take existing online videos and select the action they want their viewers to take. New users can get up and going in under one minute and start seeing results immediately.
